duties_responsibilities.duty: Run and bend conduit for commercial work.
Read and interpret blueprints and schematic drawings.

Work with a variety of electrical components including switches, lights, plugs, motor controls, switchgear, security systems, fire alarms, panels, fixtures, troubleshooting, wire ways through cable trays, high voltage, laying running and bending conduit.
Install light fixtures, receptacles, and CAT5 whips for lighting controls and lighting control devices.
Inspect electrical systems, equipment, and components to identify hazards, defects and the need for adjustment or repair.
Test electrical systems and continuity of circuits in electrical wiring equipment and fixtures.
